ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Site
Notes: Study Site

ElementDescription: Time Point
Notes: 888 = not applicable; 999 = missing

ElementDescription: My attention is often focused on aspects of myself I wish I'd stop thinking about.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I always seem to be rehashing in my mind recent things I've said or done.
Notes: 1=None of the time; 2=A little of the time; 3=Some of the time; 4=Most of the time; 5=All or almost all of the time; -8=DON'T KNOW; -7=REFUSED; -5=Presented, not answered

ElementDescription: Sometimes it is hard for me to shut off thoughts about myself.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Long after an argument or disagreement is over with, my thoughs keep going back to what happened.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I tend to "ruminate" or dwell over things that happen to me for a really long time afterward.
Notes: 1=None of the time; 2=A little of the time; 3=Some of the time; 4=Most of the time; 5=All or almost all of the time; -8=DON'T KNOW; -7=REFUSED; -5=Presented, not answered

ElementDescription: I don't waste time rethinking things that are over and done with. (reverse-scored)
Notes: 5= Strongly disagree; 4= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 2= Agree; 1= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Often I'm playing back over in my mind how I acted in a past situation.
Notes: 1=None of the time; 2=A little of the time; 3=Some of the time; 4=Most of the time; 5=All or almost all of the time; -8=DON'T KNOW; -7=REFUSED; -5=Presented, not answered

ElementDescription: I often find myself reevaluating something I've done.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I never ruminate or dwell on myself for very long. (reverse-scored)
Notes: 5= Strongly disagree; 4= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 2= Agree; 1= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: It is easy for me to put unwanted thoughts out of my mind. (reverse-scored)
Notes: 5= Strongly disagree; 4= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 2= Agree; 1= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I often reflect on episodes in my life that I should no longer concern myself with.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I spend a great deal of time thinking back over my embarrassing or disappointing moments.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Philosophical or abstract thinking doesn't appeal to me that much. (reverse-scored)
Notes: 5= Strongly disagree; 4= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 2= Agree; 1= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I'm not really a meditative type of person. (reverse-scored)
Notes: 5= Strongly disagree; 4= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 2= Agree; 1= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I love exploring my "inner" self.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: My attitudes and feelings about things fascinate me.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I don't really care for introspective or self-reflective thinking. (reverse-scored)
Notes: 5= Strongly disagree; 4= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 2= Agree; 1= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I love analyzing why I do things.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: People often say I'm a "deep" introspective type of person.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I don't care much for self-analysis. (reverse-scored)
Notes: 5= Strongly disagree; 4= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 2= Agree; 1= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I'm very self-inquisitive by nature.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I love to meditate on the nature and meaning of things.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: I often love to look at my life in philosophical ways.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Contemplating myself isn't my idea of fun. (reverse-scored)
Notes: 5= Strongly disagree; 4= Disagree; 3= Neutral; 2= Agree; 1= Strongly Agree

ElementDescription: Rumination-Reflection Questionnaire Raw Score
RRQ Factor I - Reflection Score
RRQ Factor II - Rumination Score
Higher score indicates higher level of rumination
